channel.title: Janine Turner
channel.description: Janine Turner Actress & Radio Personality (Remarks as Prepared for Delivery)

item.title: Hello fellow patriots!
item.author: Janine Turner

item.title: As an actress, I have worked on movie sets all across our great land, from New York to Los Angeles, from Miami to Seattle.
item.author: Janine Turner

item.title: As a constitutionalist, I have traversed America, visiting classrooms and town halls, from Ohio to Arizona, from Colorado to Wisconsin.
item.author: Janine Turner

item.title: What I have witnessed is the splendor of American ingenuity, the triumph of American tenacity and the goodness of the American heart.
item.author: Janine Turner

item.title: And President Obama, I'm here to tell ya, the government didn't build it. God and the American people built it!
item.author: Janine Turner

item.title: And while we are at it, I stand here as witness ­ America is exceptional.
item.author: Janine Turner

item.title: America's entrepreneurship was fostered by our Founding Fathers' vision of a Republic ­ a small government, limited by the Constitution's enumerated powers.
item.author: Janine Turner

item.title: Speaking of our republic, when Benjamin Franklin was walking out of Independence Hall after signing the Constitution, a woman approached him and said, "Sir, what form of government have you given us?" Franklin replied, "A republic, ma'am, if you can keep it!"
item.author: Janine Turner

item.title: I believe the best way to keep it ­ our republican form of government ­ is with Mitt Romney and Paul Ryan! Our Constitution guarantees us a republican form of government in Article 4 Section 4.
item.author: Janine Turner

item.title: But our liberal brethren don't feel constrained by our Constitution. That's convenient for them.
item.author: Janine Turner

item.title: By ignoring Constitutional limits, they do whatever they like ­ grow the government to unbelievable and unsustainable heights, and accumulate historic, catastrophic debt.
item.author: Janine Turner

item.title: Patrick Henry said, "Give me liberty or give me death." Today Obama enables an entitlement society that says, "Give me liberty and gimme, gimme!"
item.author: Janine Turner

item.title: Why? Because democrats depend on dependence.
item.author: Janine Turner

item.title: America was not born with a gimme, gimme mentality, and American liberty cannot survive with a gimme, gimme mentality.
item.author: Janine Turner

item.title: America was built with her hands at work, not with her hands out.
item.author: Janine Turner

item.title: The torch of the American dream is fueled with the unquenchable desire for independence, liberty and freedom.
item.author: Janine Turner

item.title: Free enterprise has paved the way for Americans to earn their own success and it has created an America that has yielded an unprecedented level of progress.
item.author: Janine Turner

item.title: This progress has lifted up humanity to greater heights of living and a greater level of dignity.
item.author: Janine Turner

item.title: Mitt Romney will preserve this exceptional American legacy.
item.author: Janine Turner

item.title: Barack Obama will destroy it.
item.author: Janine Turner

item.title: Obama is stifling the American dream primarily because it isn't HIS dream.
item.author: Janine Turner

item.title: His dream is not of an independent people. His dream is of a dependent people based upon the failed principles of antiquated governments.
item.author: Janine Turner

item.title: Mitt Romney will restore the American dream based on three of our tried and true founding principles.
item.author: Janine Turner

item.title: 1) God gives us our rights, not government. If man gives us our rights, then man can take them away. As James Madison forewarned, and history has proven, "men are not angels." 2) The checks and balances of government are paramount: without them, we have tyranny, and tyranny strangles liberty.
item.author: Janine Turner

item.title: 3) The genius of the people will prevail: for the people's voice is the republic, and for the republic Mitt Romney will stand.
item.author: Janine Turner

item.title: Thank you!
item.author: Janine Turner
